# Wallet Submissions

This directory contains submission status reports and generated templates for wallet and exchange submissions.

## Generated Files

- `SUBMISSION_STATUS.md` - Overall submission status tracking
- `coingecko-submission-email.txt` - Email template for CoinGecko submission

## Usage

These files are automatically generated by the automation scripts. To generate or update them:

```bash
# Generate submission report
make report

# Or run the submission automation script
./scripts/automate-submissions.sh
# Then select option 5 (Generate submission report)
```

## Manual Updates

You can manually edit `SUBMISSION_STATUS.md` to track progress:

1. Update status indicators (âšª â†’ ðŸŸ¡ â†’ ðŸŸ¢)
2. Check off completed items in the checklist
3. Add submission dates
4. Include PR links and notes

## Files in This Directory

- `.gitkeep` - Ensures directory exists in git
- `README.md` - This file
- `SUBMISSION_STATUS.md` - Generated submission report (not committed by default)
- `coingecko-submission-email.txt` - Generated email template (not committed by default)
